mapper.select: select id, user_id, acct_type, cap_type, cury_type, acct_name, acct_bal, avl_bal, frz_bal, acct_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from account where user_id = #{userId} and acct_type = #{acctType}

select id, user_id, acct_type, cap_type, cury_type, acct_name, acct_bal, avl_bal, frz_bal, acct_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from account where user_id = #{userId} and acct_type = #{acctType} for update
mapper.insert: insert into account (user_id, acct_type, cap_type, cury_type, acct_name, acct_bal, avl_bal, frz_bal, acct_status, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater) values (#{userId}, #{acctType}, #{capType}, #{curyType}, #{acctName}, #{acctBal}, #{avlBal}, #{frzBal}, #{acctStatus}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{updater})
mapper.update: update account set acct_bal = #{acctBal}, avl_bal = #{avlBal}, frz_bal = #{frzBal}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime}, updater = #{updater} where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
